ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Class MirrorLinkMediaBrowserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • android.service.media.MediaBrowserService
            • ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.MirrorLinkMediaBrowserService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.os.Handler.Callback, TimelineCallback

    public class MirrorLinkMediaBrowserService
extends android.service.media.MediaBrowserService
implements android.os.Handler.Callback, TimelineCallback
    Handles Music Playback through MirrorLink(tm) by implementing a MediaBrowserService.
